title: 17: Profanity & Parenting
itunes:title: 17: Profanity & Parenting
itunes:subtitle: Matt talks to kids, parents, and the ”psychologist of swearing”, Dr. Timothy Jay, to find out just how bad it is to swear around your kids.
description:
